Package magellan.client.swing.completion

Class OrderEditorKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.EditorKit
      • javax.swing.text.DefaultEditorKit
        • javax.swing.text.StyledEditorKit
          • magellan.client.swing.completion.OrderEditorKit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class OrderEditorKit
extends javax.swing.text.StyledEditorKit
    This object is designed to change the default behaviour of JTextPane. I (Ilja Pavkovic) personally dislike the way <CTRL>-<Right> and <CTRL>-<Left;gt; is handled. Therefore I changed NextWordAction and PreviousWordAction.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getActions

        public javax.swing.Action[] getActions()
        Fetches the order list for the editor. This is the list of orders supported by the superclass augmented by the collection of orders defined locally for style operations.
        Overrides:
        getActions in class javax.swing.text.StyledEditorKit
        Returns:
        the order list
